name: Rea Dy
text: Blaze pizza is always good, you build your own pizza. This particular location has outdoor seating which is great for Covid19 season :D

name: Duck Under
text: Always good! Just ask for a few extras with your toppings. Line can get long, but worth the wait. Brownies are bomb. Located Inside mall food court. On the first floor.

text: Good pizza fresh ingredients,love Red Vine pizza, and pepperoni. Fresh juices are awesome.  Blue Sky sodas on tap are uniquely different.

text: I had a superb  in this spot. We loved the extraordinary ambience and the menu. The waiters are very amiable. I’m happy we ultimately managed to try this place.
